segments.text: Excuse me , Professor , is there a time when I could meet with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could meet with you tomorrow anywhere from two until four ; what time works out best ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to come in at three o'clock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am glad that that works out ; can you find my office ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just follow the walkway to the outside and climb the stairs to the third floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you do get lost , just ask someone in the building to point the way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you need to cancel your appointment , please give me a call !
segments.speaker: S2
